original_text: “The cities that you give to the Levites shall be the six cities of refuge, where you shall permit the manslayer to flee, and in addition to them you shall give forty-two cities.
korean_text: 너희가 레위인에게 줄 성읍은 살인자들이 피하게 할 도피성으로 여섯 성읍이요 그 외에 사십이 성읍이라

sentences.original_text: The cities that you give to the Levites
shall be the six cities of refuge,
where you shall permit the manslayer to flee,
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳은 네가 살인자에게 도망하도록 허락할 곳이며,
